item.title: Server title error
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

At the top of my server i put it to say Jarscape in purple font, but it only shows for a couple of seconds before dissapearing, how do i fix it to stay there all the time? code used: [code]//Playercount at top of screen
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@gra@Players - " + players, 6570);
sendFrame126("@mag@Jarscape", 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673}}}
//setInterfaceWalkable(14600);//201

}[/code]

Read full topic
